description: Valley Luchadora Margaret “Mar” Diego faced a lot of adversity before getting to where she is today. She is formerly-incarcerated — an experience that guides her today as a proud employer of formerly homeless and incarcerated individuals at her pizzeria, Dough Girl.
Valley Luchadora Kristy Sandoval is an artist whose work brings awareness to social justice issues and focuses on female empowerment. She has also helped revitalize Mural Mile here in Pacoima.

Valley Luchadora Evelyn Cortez-Davis is an engineering trailblazer inspiring the next generation of Latinas in STEM. She is a civil engineer at the LADWP and the first Latina to be appointed Director of Water Engineering and Technical Services.
